attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Four thousand city workers receive more than a million pounds each in bonuses, creating a super rich society  right at the top, fuelling envy, crime, antagonism and socially undesirable behaviour. Thousands more receive six figure bonuses, often for failure and "early retirement" from their positions, whence they often move on to other lucrative positions carrying even more "bonus entitlements."
